availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Wood (Clinton County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Clinton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Wood and Mary Wood. Married to Luverna S. Wood. Father of Mary E. Wood and William R. Wood. Merchant in Clinton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Clinton County in 1850. Farmer in Clinton County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Clinton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District 2, p. 184B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District 2, p. 337.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, p. 174.f
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, p. 352A.
